value.0: This is a template conversation containing scripts and formatting for enhanced skill & ability use in conversation.

value.0: <StartAction>[Failure]</Start> The NPC raises the alarm (fires the UD event on the Area)

<StartAction>[Success]</Start> Conversation ends. The NPC turns hostile but is temporarily immobilized. If he's still alive when the spell wears off, the alarm will sound (fires the UD event on the Area)
<StartAction>[Invalid Tactic]</Start> Sorry, you are currently unable to cast Hold Person.
<StartAction>[Failure]</Start> The NPC raises the alarm (fires the UD event on the Area)
